overview: Short film that pays homage to Rod Serling's famous series, The Twilight Zone.  Carlos is a young man who lives with his partner, Alicia. The problems to pay the bills make Carlos succumb to the world of online gambling, neglecting and forgetting, more and more, his girlfriend, who is becoming a mannequin as Carlos can not unhook.
tagline: Do not gamble with your luck
title: The Fever
